currentTask.title: Integrate teleportation effects with player actions
currentTask.description: Complete the teleportation system by integrating the visual effects with the teleportation action. Update the Jogador class to trigger smoke effects at the current position before teleporting, then show arrival effects at the destination. Ensure the teleportation works smoothly with other player actions and doesn't conflict with existing movement, jumping, or combat systems.

previousImplementations.title: Add teleportation action and V key input handling
previousImplementations.description: Implement the core teleportation functionality in the Jogador class by adding a teleportation method and teleportation state tracking. Update the Estado_Level1 class to handle V key press events that trigger the teleportation action. The teleportation should move the player 300 pixels in the direction they are facing (using the olhandoDireita boolean to determine direction).

previousImplementations.title: Implement collision-aware teleportation logic
previousImplementations.description: Enhance the teleportation method to include collision detection with map tiles. Use the existing collision detection system (calculaLimites and tile checking methods from ObjetoMapa) to ensure the player cannot teleport into blocked tiles. If the destination would place the player inside a blocked tile, find the maximum safe distance the player can travel in that direction before hitting the obstacle.

previousImplementations.title: Create teleportation smoke effects
previousImplementations.description: Create a new TeleportEffect class based on the existing Explosao effect system to display smoke effects at teleportation locations. The effect should use the same visual approach as the wolf death explosion but may use different sprites or timing. Integrate these effects into the Estado_Level1 class to show effects at both the departure and arrival positions during teleportation.

implementationStrategy.scopeBoundary: Implement only the functionality described in "Integrate teleportation effects with player actions" - do NOT re-implement features from previous tasks
